Description.Text: The hotel is situated in a seaside district 15 km from the centre of Gdansk. It is near the E-7 route and can be reached in 20 minutes by car or easily by public transport using the 112 bus line. The hotel is situated by the sea, in a pine forest 100 metres from a sandy beach. The football stadium is 22 km away. The nearest airport is approximately 33 km from the hotel.
All rooms have en-suite bathrooms with a shower and come equipped with a TV, a radio and a telephone. Internet access and an ironing set are standard features of all accommodation.

The hotel offers 300 beds in modern, comfortable double room suites and single, double and triple rooms. The hotel features a 24-hour reception, a hotel safe, a cloakroom and lift access to upper floors. Guests can enjoy a drink in the cafÃ© and pub/bar and dine in the restaurant. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access and a car park for those arriving by car.
